column1: Image:Silme nuquerna.gifSilmë Nuquerna is the name in Quenya of the thirtieth letter of the Tengwar alphabet.
column3: The names of the letters  In form it is an inversion of the twenty-ninth letter (Silmë).  It is mostly used as a variation
column4: especially in modes employing superimposed tehtar
column7: The additional letters and it represents S.   However
column9: as seen as in the inscription on the Doors of Durin of Moria
column12: The vowels  The Westron name for this letter is Ós.See Westron Tengwar
